function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent 'business contact' between A1 and A3 agents increases the risk of disease transmission in the population.","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases, leading to potential outbreaks or pandemics.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, use of personal protective equipment, and regular testing for contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote communication technologies, and surveillance systems for monitoring population movement.","People":"A1 and A3 agents, general population.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, employers."},{"Description":"Monthly 'accounting' actions involve economic transactions and payment of taxes, increasing the potential for disease transmission during in-person interactions.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to in-person economic transactions.","Mitigation":"Encourage digital payment methods, remote tax filing, and virtual financial transactions to reduce in-person interactions.","Technologies":"Online payment platforms, digital tax filing systems, and secure financial transaction technologies.","People":"A2, A3, and A4 agents, government, financial institutions.","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, employers."},{"Description":"Complexity of the model and economic interactions can lead to improper consideration of disease transmission and risk management.","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of disease transmission dynamics and ineffective risk mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Provide training and education on disease transmission risk, encourage interdisciplinary collaboration, and ensure input from public health experts in model development.","Technologies":"Simulation models, data analytics tools, and collaboration platforms for interdisciplinary communication.","People":"Model developers, public health experts, decision-makers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities."}]}
